p: The aim of this study was to evaluate the capacity of Ae. aegypti from NC to transmit the four serotypes of DENV. One DENV strain representative of each serotype/genotype isolated in NC during the recent outbreaks was selected as follows: DENV-1 genotype I “Asia” in 2016; DENV-1 genotype IV “Pacific” in 2003; DENV-2 genotype Cosmopolitan in 1998, DENV-3 genotype I in 2014 and DENV-4 genotype IIa in 2009.
